statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{7.39}; top has length \displaystyle{9.29}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{8.31} and \displaystyle{8.99}. The height is \displaystyle{8.03}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{9.29}+{8.99}+{7.39}+{8.31}={33.98}.
